lines.text: Worthless fool! How can you ever help to beat me? By the next time I'm done with you, there'll be nothing but stinking meat!
Just who WAS that man in the mask, anyway?
One thing's for sure...he's not the Lone Ranger!
I know that you killed Father, you stupid bastard!
Oh, no... what in God's name have I done? Sulia...

[during the four-on-one fight against Laucorn, Joe whips up a tornado that barely misses Gaudemis]
Hey, don't get carried away, asshole! Joe Higashi's gonna give you a fight you won't ever forget!

[after Andy sees Hauer is trying to kill Mai]
All right, you bastard, this time...
[Andy jumps into the air to attack Hauer]
See what you've done? You made my dancing lovely stop... Barbarians
[Hauer sips his drink and jumps, dropping his glass which is destroyed by a gust of wind that follows his movements]

[Billy sees how fast Hauer moves and tries to follow his movements, while being surprised by the wind that destroys Hauer's drink]
Son of a bitch!
